CustomField.description: Score based on Total # of years as EDF Donor. Factors into PG Prospect rating.
CustomField.formula:
IF ( of_Years_as_EDF_Donor__c >=35,3,
IF ( of_Years_as_EDF_Donor__c >=20,2,
IF ( of_Years_as_EDF_Donor__c >=1,1,0)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Score based on Total # of years as EDF Donor. Factors into PG Prospect rating. 1-19 = 1 20-34 = 2 35+ = 3
CustomField.label: PG Donor Year Score
